title: COVID-19 Granular Data - France
description: Sourcing of COVID-19 cases granular data in different subregions of France, aggregated by @opencovid19-fr, https://github.com/opencovid19-fr/

fields.name: confirmed
fields.description: Cumulative number of confirmed covid-19 cases at the given location until the given time

fields.name: hospitalized
fields.description: Number of hospitalized people due to covid-19 at the given location at the given time

fields.name: recovering
fields.description: Number of people recovering from covid-19 at the given location at the given time

fields.name: recovered
fields.description: Cumulative number of people healed from covid-19 at the given location until the given time

fields.name: deaths
fields.description: Cumulative number of people who passed away from covid-19 at the given location until the given time

fields.name: source_name
fields.description: Name of the source of information relevant to the given location at the given time

fields.name: source_url
fields.description: Uniform Resource Locator link of the source of information relevant to the given location at the given time

fields.name: source_archive
fields.description: Uniform Resource Locator link of the archive of the source of information relevant to the given location at the given time

fields.name: source_type
fields.description: Type of the source of information: National Health Ministry/Regional health agencies
